word:
Abridged

9 - Dear Friend

Date: July 11, 1904 Location: Takoma Park, Maryland Source: Letter 231, 1904 Status: Portions published
Context: Back from her tour of the South, Ellen White pens a note to a friend, Mrs. M. Crawford.
My dear friend,
     I have just returned to this place from a trip to the South. We were away for about six weeks, and during that time we visited Nashville, Graysville, and Huntsville.
